workflow.name: Automate video content posting to multiple social platforms with Postiz
workflow.description:
*This workflow contains community nodes that are only compatible with the self-hosted version of n8n.*

This workflow automates the distribution and scheduling of video content across **multiple social platforms** (TikTok, YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, Threads) through **[Postiz](https://postiz.com/?ref=onenode)**. Videos are collected from Google Drive, approved manually, and scheduled via the Postiz community node. 

---

## üßæ Requirements

- **Google Drive** account with access to the folder that will watch for new items uploaded.
- videos in `mp4` format ready to be shared or, alternatively you can connect a community node from Cloud Convert to convert the format before uploading into Postiz.
- [**Postiz**](https://postiz.com/?ref=onenode) account with integrations for TikTok, YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, and Threads
---

## üîó Useful Links

- [Postiz Docs](https://docs.postiz.com/)
- [Postiz Community Node](https://www.npmjs.com/package/n8n-nodes-postiz)

---

## üîÑ Workflow Steps

1. **Trigger: Google Drive File Added**
   - Watches your selected Google Drive folder for new file uploads.

2. **Download File**
   - Downloads the detected video from Drive.

3. **Upload to Postiz**
   - Video is uploaded to Postiz to prepare for social scheduling.

4. **Set Fields**
   - Manual setting of social options 

5. **Extract Datetime (AI)**
   - Uses OpenAI to find/predict intended publish date & time, as the datetime format  is required to schedule on Postiz

6. **Get Social Integrations**
   - Fetches a list of user‚Äôs connected platforms from Postiz.

7. **Split and Filter Integrations**
   - Splits the process per platform (TikTok, YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, Threads).

8. **Schedule Post**
   - For each enabled platform, schedules the video with chosen options.

---

## üôã‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Need Help?

Connect with **[1 Node](https://1node.ai)**

attributes.name: datetime
attributes.description: =Date and time in ISO 8601 format with milliseconds and UTC + 2 ('Z'), e.g., 2024-12-14T08:18:54.274Z. Today is {{ $now }}. Return the output in UTC+2.

parameters.content:
# TikTok post settings

- **title**  
  - Text string for the caption of your post (max ~2200 characters).

- **privacy_level**  
  - Who can see your video.  
  - Allowed: `PUBLIC_TO_EVERYONE`, `MUTUAL_FOLLOW_FRIENDS`, `FOLLOWER_OF_CREATOR`, `SELF_ONLY`

- **duet**  
  - Allow others to create Duet videos with your post.  
  - Allowed: `true` or `false`

- **stitch**  
  - Allow others to use your video in their Stitch.  
  - Allowed: `true` or `false`

- **comment**  
  - Enable or disable comments on your post.  
  - Allowed: `true` or `false`

- **autoAddMusic**  
  - Add music automatically to your video.  
  - Allowed: `"yes"` or `"no"`

- **brand_content_toggle**  
  - Marks the post as branded/promotional content.  
  - Allowed: `true` or `false`

- **brand_organic_toggle**  
  - Marks branded content as organic (natural, unpaid).  
  - Allowed: `true` or `false`

- **content_posting_method**  
  - Method of posting.  
  - Allowed: `"DIRECT_POST"` or `"UPLOAD"`

## Set fields 
Adjust your social media settings according to your needs

## Requirements
### Postiz
- Create an account on [Postiz](https://postiz.com/?ref=onenode)
- Install the [community node from Postiz](https://www.npmjs.com/package/n8n-nodes-postiz)
- Connect your desired social media accounts
- Get your API key and enable credentials on n8n

### Google Drive
- Create a folder that will watch for new files added
- Enable your credentials on n8n for Google Drive
- Insert a video in mp4 format. Or use Cloud Convert and convert it to mp4 before uploading to Postiz

### Human in the loop
- Confirm the post title, date and time (you can insert in natural language), and caption by filling the form

## Configuration
Edit the fields that will be passed later into the workflow inside the red sticker.
Adapt the system prompt to generate the tags for youtube

## Storage cleanup
Deletes the initial file uploaded in your designated Drive folder

user.bio: Hi, I'm Aitor with 1 Node. We create practical AI solutions for businesses. Nothing fancy, just tools that solve real problems and help you scale. Always happy to have a conversation about how we might be able to help you grow

data.details: The Filter node can be used to filter items based on a condition. If the condition is met, the item will be passed on to the next node. If the condition is not met, the item will be omitted. Conditions can be combined together by AND(meet all conditions), or OR(meet at least one condition).
